description.content: Comprehensive test suite for the News Filter backend API, including article creation, feedback, rescoring, and debugging functionality. Manual scoring and LLM rescoring are fully separated, with independent endpoints and strict error handling to ensure no cross-compatibility. The test plan covers all valid and invalid flows for both manual and LLM-based rescoring.
